remarks: The ring base set of the constructed partial vector space A are all translation group endomorphisms (for a fiducial co-atom ` W ` ). (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvasca.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvasca.d $e |- D = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvasca.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvasca.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvasca $p |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> F = D ) $.
